intro: This document serves as the Product User Manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) CLCplus Backbone 2023, a crucial component of the CLMS's land cover/land use monitoring efforts. It provides a comprehensive guide for users seeking to understand and utilise the CLCplus Backbone 2023 product, which offers a large-scale, seamless, and high-resolution inventory of European land cover based on Sentinel-2 satellite imagery. The manual details the product's specifications, class nomenclature, data quality, application areas, and terms of use, enabling effective integration of the data into various environmental analyses and applications.
keywords: Land Use, Land Use Change and Forestry (LULUCF)
